### Lab Exercise
```{r}
dino_data <-datasaurus_dozen %>%filter(dataset == "dino")
ggplot(data = dino_data, mapping = aes(x = x, y = y)) +geom_point()

```
```{r}

ggplot(data = star_data, mapping = aes(x = x, y = y)) +geom_point()
```
